description:
What is low-profile, can carry up to 50kg across the country, and weighs the same as 7.5 Clif Bars? The Streamliner Road DLX Pannier Rack is ready to turn your road bike into a super-fast commuter bike. The mounting system allows for the rack to be attached to your quick-release axle, making it ideal for road bikes that don't come equipped with eyelets. The mounting hardware pushes the rack further back to improve heel clearance and create more room for disc brake calipers.

  • Made of 6061-T6 aluminum with double hand-welds for strength and durability
  • Narrow profile helps keep it out of the wind and improves stability when panniers are loaded
  • Mounting method makes this rack compatible with disc brake–equipped bikes
  • Stabilisation bar attaches to your rear brake caliper
  • Load capacity of 50kg is more than you'll want to carry up any hill
  • Compatible with 700c wheels
name: Axiom Streamliner Road DLX Pannier Rack
